‚ÄúSpring constant‚Äù, \(k\) Particle mass, \(m\) Index,
\(E_n = n + \frac{1}{2}\)
\(H_n(x)=(-1)^n e^{x^2}\frac{\mathrm{d}^n}{\mathrm{d}x^n}e^{-x^2}\)
\(\omega=\sqrt\frac{k}{m}\)
\(\tilde x = x\sqrt\frac{m\omega}{\hbar}\)
\(\psi_n(x)=\frac{\pi^{-\frac{1}{4}}}{\sqrt{2^n n!}}H_n(\tilde x)e^{-\frac{\tilde x^2}{2}}\)
